ThingDef.Name: PCA_Melee_PoweredSpear_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona powered spear
ThingDef.description: A highly-advanced spear. Inspired by the spears carried by the ancient Immortal guard of the Achaemenid Empire, they are commonly used by the imperial elite heavy infantry of the same name. The blade is coated in a field of ionized plasma, helping it cut through enemy armor.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_500SWTactical_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 500 S&W Magnum Tactical
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern double-action revolver. Fires one of the most powerful pistol cartridges ever made. Comes equipped with reflex sights.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PCA_Gun_ChargeARARC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona RX-40 charge RARC
ThingDef.description: Charged-shot semi-automatic recoilless auto rail-assisted cannon firing a massive charged cartridge. Features a recoil mitigation system and equipped with an advanced targeting computer that helps the shooter with target acquisition. Extremely heavy even after extensive use of plasteel in many of the weapon's parts, it's meant for use by very elite and augmented forces. It uses normal 40mm charge cartridges but mixes the recoilless and rail-assist technologies in consecutive stages to accelerate the projectiels to extreme velocities while keeping recoil to a minimum, and because of that the unstable energy surrounding the projectile becomes even more volatile and behaves even more explosive.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
